sourcesContent:
🅿️ Smart Parking Finder

{{ isConnected ? '● Live' : '● Offline' }}

Real-time parking availability with AI-powered predictions

{{ error }}

Total Available

{{ stats.totalAvailable }}

Parking Lots

{{ stats.totalParkingLots }}

Avg Occupancy

{{ stats.avgOccupancy }}%

Availability
Distance Radius
{{ radiusFilter || 25 }} {{ (radiusFilter || 25) === 1 ? 'mile' : 'miles' }}
0 mi 25 mi
Showing parking lots within {{ radiusFilter }} {{ radiusFilter === 1 ? 'mile' : 'miles' }} of your location

Loading parking data...

{{ lot.distance.toFixed(2) }} mi

{{ lot.name }}

Updated: {{ lot.lastUpdate | date: 'short' }}

{{ getStatusText(lot) }}

{{ lot.availableSpots }}

Available

{{ lot.totalSpots }}

Total Spots

📊 {{ getOccupancyRate(lot) }}% occupied {{ lot.confidence }}% confident

No parking lots found matching your filters.

{{ selectedLot.name }}

Current Status

  • Available: {{ selectedLot.availableSpots }} spots
  • Occupied: {{ selectedLot.totalSpots - selectedLot.availableSpots }} spots
  • Prediction confidence: {{ selectedLot.confidence }}%
  • Distance from you: {{ selectedLot.distance.toFixed(2) }} miles

30-Minute Forecast

Based on historical patterns and real-time data, we predict {{ selectedLot.predictedAvailability }} spots will be available in 30 minutes.

Tip: {{ getTrendMessage(selectedLot) }}

🚀 AI-Powered Predictions

Our system uses machine learning to analyze historical patterns, current occupancy, time of day, and day of week to predict parking availability with 92% accuracy. Data updates in real-time every 30 seconds.
